abstract: Instead of putting stuff on sale, we came up with an exclusive, limited-edition collection of products — at their regular prices.
snippet: Instead of putting stuff on sale, we came up with an exclusive, limited-edition collection of products — at their regular prices.
lead_paragraph: On the Monday before Black Friday, one of our longtime retail employees came into my office seeking advice. She was thinking about creating a Facebook post aimed at our local customers and offering some secret in-store-only specials on Black Friday. She knew we shied away from discounts at Jimmy Beans Wool, but she wanted to double-check.

headline.main: Why We Don’t Offer Black Friday Discounts
